name: AvoMD, Inc.
description: Operator of a no-code technology platform intended for making clinical content actionable at the point of care. The company's software offers physicians the knowledge they need through a unique clinician user interface and has been shown to dramatically increase clinical guideline usability and usage, enabling healthcare organizations to digitize their clinical pathways/content and put them in the hands of providers instantly.
one_liner: Operator of a no-code technology platform intended for making clinical content actionable at the point of care. The company's software offers physicians the knowledge they need through a unique clinician user interface and has been shown to dramatically increase clinical guideline usability and usage, enabling healthcare organizations to digitize their clinical pathways/content and put them in the hands of providers instantly.
